Articles.Content:
Just curious, if it wouldn't take long to code, could coub embedding be re-added to the forum? I know people hardly post them but it's always been a tradition of mine to post my hype train coubs near the release of a next version of KSP. Sadly though I now have to post a link, rather than an embed since the HTML embedding no longer works. I'd love it if I could embed coubs once again.

https://coub.com/view/35xku

http://coub.com/view/37lv8

http://coub.com/view/3b1zk

Cheers, and happy Thursday to everyone east of the sunrise
Your suggestion has been moved to Kerbal Network, since it's about the forum rather than the game.
Ahh many thanks Vanamonde. I'm still having troubles it seems
